issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce

Submit application 
Switch RM and check the percentage of queue usage


Queue percentage shown as NaN
fields.summary: NaN in Queue percentage for cluster apps page

comments.body: [~bibinchundatt] - is this temporary, while all the NMs are switching to the new active RM?
Only during switch and its temporary.

This message was automatically generated.

[~bibinchundatt],

Thanks for working on this, generally looks good, I think you don't need to duplicate app report parameters for two scenarios:
{code}
...return ApplicationResourceUsageReport.newInstance(liveContainers.size(),
...
{code}
You can calculate queue/cluster usage separately and only create ApplicationResourceUsageReport once.

[~leftnoteasy]
Thank you for looking into patch . Updated patch based on comments please do review.
